alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 12:19PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lincoln County through 1245 PM MDT... At 1219 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Elkol, which is also 12 miles south of Kemmerer, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elkol, Kemmerer and Diamondville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
